misdemeanour.translation[0].definitions[: a bad or unacceptable action that is not very serious
Alfred beat his children for even the smallest misdemeanour.
a crime that is not very serious
misdemeanour.translation[1].definitions[: a bad or unacceptable action that is not very serious, at least from a legal point of view
a crime that is not as serious as a FELONY (=very serious crime such as robbery or murder)
He pleaded guilty to lying on a loan application, which is a misdemeanor in this state.
